sources.title: The Revenge of Frankenstein
sources.description: Having escaped execution and assumed an alias, Baron Frankenstein transplants his deformed underling's brain into a perfect body, but the effectiveness of the process and the secret of his identity soon begin to unravel.

metadata.Plot: Baron Frankenstein escapes from the guillotine and goes to Germany. There, he names himself Dr. Stein and plans to restart his experiments by using parts of dead bodies.
metadata.Writer: Jimmy Sangster, Hurford Janes, George Baxt
metadata.Actors: Peter Cushing, Francis Matthews, Eunice Gayson
